mapper.insert: insert into order (id, user_id, publ_id, number, add_ts, remove_ts, commit_ts) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{removeTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commitTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
